name: Sabotage 1.0
description:
Sabotage 1.0

Action game based on the decade of the 80s and the  Cold War period. Inspired by historical events, movies,  writers, video games and much more from the 1980s.

REQUIREMENTS:

Minimum requirements:

Processor: Intel i5

Video: Intel HD Graphics 4400 or 5000 (for Core i7 options)

Memory: 4 GB DDR3

Hard-disk: 2,8 GB

O.S.: Windows 7/8/8.1/10/11.

Optimal requirements:

Processor: Intel i7

Video: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 980M or more.

Memory: 8 GB DDR3

Hard-disk: 2,8 GB

O.S.: Windows 10/11.

Game time: 3 hours (minimun) to infinite.

Youtube channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCW6WGwUOkiF1sw9f-D3QYsg

Developed by Alternative Reality ´15 Games (AR-15).
